sentences.en: Around the world, governments have subsidized the housing of middle- and upper-income groups.
sentences.cn: 全世界各政府都补贴过中高收入人群的住房。

sentences.en: Farming is heavily subsidized (= subsidized a lot ) by the government.
sentences.cn: 农业得到政府的大量补贴。

sentences.en: If you don't subsidize ballet and opera, seat prices will have to go up to pay for it.
sentences.cn: 如果你不为芭蕾和歌剧提供补贴，就得提高剧场票价来为此买单。

sentences.en: In are insufficient to cover all the expenses to subsidize part of them.
sentences.cn: 全部费用都用在他们自己身上,教会还要津贴帮助的.

sentences.en: Later, they began searching for sponsors to subsidize a cash prize for the winner.
sentences.cn: 他们后来还开始找寻赞助者来提供奖金给优胜者.

sentences.en: Many universities subsidize research and publications.
sentences.cn: 许多大学资助研究和出版.

sentences.en: Provincial financial departments will also subsidize those cities and counties in financial straits through transfer payments.
sentences.cn: 市、县级财政有困难的,省级财政也要通过转移支付予以补助.

sentences.en: She argued that schools should not rely on students to subsidize their own educations.
sentences.cn: 她认为学校不应该指望赚学生的钱发教育津贴.

sentences.en: The implicit contract: quietly subsidize her holiday.
sentences.cn: 含蓄合同: 悄悄地补贴她的假期花费.

sentences.en: To deal with the equity problem, subsidize health insurance for the poor and lower middle class.
sentences.cn: 为解决公平问题, 应对穷人及中产阶级下层人士的医疗保险予以补贴.

words.tran_cn: 资助或补助（subsidize的过去时和过去分词）
资助；给与奖助金；向…行贿

trans.tran_cn: 资助；给与奖助金；向…行贿
trans.tran_en: if a government or organization subsidizes a company, activity etc, it pays part of its costs

trans.tran_cn: 以津贴补助，以金钱收买，向…发放奖金，用贿赂拉拢
trans.tran_en: if a government or organization subsidizes a company, activity etc, it pays part of its costs
